section.title: Browse an existing LDAP Server
section.para: We browsed the LDAP Server at ldap1.mi.hdm-stuttgart.de using Apache Directory Studio. First we connected as anonymous user. Finding our names was easy by just typing in uid and our respective HdM token in the filter fields. Then we reconnected with our user DNs. The difference was that we were now able to see our enrolment numbers.

section.para: We installed the server by running:
section.screen: aptitude install dialog aptitude install slapd
section.para: Afterwards we set the server's root DIT to dc=betrayer,dc=com by using dpkg-reconfigure slapd.
